title: Portell Says Retailers Reaching Gen Z
itunes:title: Portell Says Retailers Reaching Gen Z
description:
Greg Portell, Lead Partner at A.T. Kearney, discusses Black Friday and Cyber Monday sales data. He also talks about how brick & mortar stores are working to attract Generation Z consumers who he says want authenticity from brands.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
